org.apache.cxf.aegis
Class Context

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.cxf.aegis.Context

public class Context
extends Object

Holds information about the message request and response. Applications should not need to work with this class.

Since:
Feb 13, 2004
Author:
Dan Diephouse
